description: Try our easy to follow Thai Watermelon & Prawn Fried Rice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Thai Watermelon & Prawn Fried Rice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.33 cup Thai chilli jam stirfry paste

recipeInstructions.text: Divide rice among bowls. Top with prawns, watermelon and coriander. Scatter over nuts and serve with remaining lime cut into wedges.
